originalText.text: I did GMAT tutoring with Mike and it was a great experience! I started off with a strong cold score on a practice test and thought I could study on my own, but it was like boiling the ocean and I quickly found I wasn't making the progress I wanted to. The Menlo course not only organizes what you need to study but trains you to answer questions efficiently. Being able to check in with Mike along the way on specific areas I was struggling with was a game changer. It's ok to ask for help! Especially if you're a working professional, tutoring with Menlo is a good path for getting the score you need on a timeline/schedule that works for you.

originalText.text: Menlo tutoring is one of the best investments I have made. Chris Speck and David Baird are two of the most patient, kind, and supportive people I have met. I would not have the success I had without them. Menlo will identify your strengths and weaknesses by working 1:1 with you and customizing your tutoring experience to help you achieve your goals. I highly recommend to anyone who is looking for help on their GMAT and GRE journey.

originalText.text: Menlo Coaching was a godsend to me. After 2 months of self-study, I decided to partner with a tutor to take my score to the next level. Hailey responded to my query almost immediately and walked me through the process at Menlo Coaching. The lesson materials are phenomenal - I learned more in one week of video lessons than in my months of self-study. The materials not only cover subject content, but tips and tricks on how to take the test as well. Throughout my journey, Hailey constantly cheered me on and encouraged me when I was disappointed in my scores. I was eventually able to get a score that was higher than expected! I would highly recommend Menlo Coaching and Hailey to anyone looking to hit their target scores.

originalText.text:
Worth every cent.

In search of a GMAT Tutor, able to push me to the 99th percentile, I came across Menlo Coaching and the opportunity to work with Chris Kane. Initially hesitant due to a lack of personal recommendations, I was relieved of all doubt after an introductory meeting with Chris. He possess a depth of knowledge built over decades of working with the GMAT and a breadth of students, that is second to none. This translates to an incredibly efficient process, not only in analyzing one’s weaknesses but also in transferring knowledge and teaching the right methodologies for a successful exam. I was able to exceed my personal target after only a couple of weeks of tutoring. The only regret I have is that I considered tutoring too late – the efficiency and professionalism would have saved me multiple weeks of self-study.

Thank you, Chris!

originalText.text: I had an amazing experience using Menlo coaching for my GMAT prep. The class size was small, and our teacher, Chris, did a great job of bringing the energy and driving home crucial concepts to score a 700+. The 5 week course was perfect for a busy working professional, and I personally saw my score increase by 100 points. Chris was very responsive to all email questions and provided the perfect strategy for test day. Thank you Chris and Menlo!
